Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2010 11:37PM compassionate wrote: When I had my biopsy done my nipple bled for a month. The Dr. thinks he may have "nicked" a vein. It really was a month before it stopped bleeding completely. Sorry, I know it is scary but I agree with an earlier posting, look for signs of infection, apply an antibiotic ointment and see your Dr. if you are still concerned. The whole thing is scary, it is OK to be concerned. =)
Posts.Title: leaking from incision site heyjude62 Lisa1962
